post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hi chilhoan

I just wanted to touch base, I have a Sybase/Unix developer role that I really need help with. I'm pulling out my hair here. I'm putting together a referal rewards program so we can get cash to you if a person gets placed. So lets touch base so I can see what's new with you and send me an updated resume. I appreciate your help with this. Here is the link of the job below.

http://www.gurulink.ca/jobview.asp?JobID=696

If you could forward this message to your network I know you know the guru I need.

Regards,
Miguel
416-889-2409
miguel@gurulink.ca



Miguel Allamani
416.644.8855
http://www.gurulink.ca
post.title: Sybase/Unix developer
